actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To extend the filing period for requests for reliquidation of certain entries.

summary.text: Provides that stuffed dolls and doll skins that are imported into the United States on or after December 31, 1985, and before October 1, 1988, shall be liquidated as duty free as of October 1, 1988.

titles.title: To extend the filing period for requests for reliquidation of certain entries.
